Translations.Text: Dui renlei de qingsuan linjinle, dan tamen [xianzai] haishi shuhu dayi, bu yu zhongshi.
Mei dang [“gulanjing” zhong] you xin de qishi [gaojie] cong tamen de zhu [an la] jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiaozhe tingqu.
Bu yi zhe de xinzhong chongman xienian, tamen mimi xieshang shuo:“Zhe zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, nimen mingzhi shi moshu hai yao jieshou [shuncong] ma?”
Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao tiandi jian suo shuo de yiqie. Ta shi quan wen de, quanzhi de [zhu].”

Dan tamen shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing” zhong yi jiang shi mu sheng de jing wen] shi yige za meng. Bu, shi ta weizao de yanci! Bu, ta shi yi wei shiren! Rang ta xiang yiqian bei paiqian de shizhemen yiyang xianshi women yi zhong jixiang ba!”
[Jinguan wo ceng jiang shi tamen jixiang], dan zai tamen zhiqian wo suo huimie de chengshi zhong, meiyou yige quexin jixiang de.[Xianzai] tamen hui quexin ma?
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo ceng paiqian xuduo ren [zuo shizhe] bing qishi tamen. Jiaru nimen bu zhidao, nimen keyi qingjiao shou gaojie zhe [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” de xuezhe].
Wo meiyou ba tamen [shizhe] zaocheng bu chi shi wu de shenti, tamen ye bushi yongsheng de.
Ranhou, wo shixianle dui tamen de nuoyan, wo zhengjiule tamen he wo suo yiyu zhe, huimiele chaoyue fadu zhe.
[Renmen a!] Wo que yi jiang shi nimen yi bu jingdian [“gulanjing”], qizhong you dui nimen de gaojie, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Wo ceng huimiele xuduo xing bu yi de chengshi [de minzhong], bing zai cihou chuangzaole bie de minzhong.
Mei dang tamen gandao wo de xingfa [jijiang jianglin] shi, tamen turan shitu taozou.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen buyao taozou, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de shechi shenghuo he haozhai ba! Yibian nimen shoushen wen.”
Tamen jiaohan shuo:“Women zhen gaisi! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Tamen de zhe zhong aiming bu hui zhongduan, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng haoxiang gang geguo de [zhuangjia] yiyang er xiaoshi.
Wo chuangzao tiandi wanwu, bingfei wei le yule.
Jiaru wo xiang xiaoqian [ru yongyou qi er deng], wo yiding hui zai wo zheli huode xiaoqian, jiaru wo yu zuo.
Bu, wo yi zhenli [“gulanjing”] huiji miuwu [bu xinyang deng], miuwu zao daole huimie, turan xiaoshile. Nimen [dui wo] niezao huangyan [ru wangyan an la you qi er] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de [an la]; fan zai ta nali de [tianshi], dou chongbai ta, tamen ji bu aoman, ye bu pijuan.
Tamen [tianshi] zhouye zansong ta, hao bu songxie.
Nandao tamen zai da dishang shezhi [chongbai] de zhuzai neng shi sizhe fuhuo ma?
Chu an la wai, jiaru tiandi jian hai you qita ying shou chongbai de zhuzai, name, tiandi biding huimiele. Zanmei an la——baozuo zhi zhu chaojue [zhu]! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Ta [an la] suo zuo de shi bu shou zewen de, er tamen [suo zuo de] que shi yao shoushen wen de.

Nandao tamen yao she ta er xuan bai qita zhuzai ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba! Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi dui wo de tongdao de tixing [gaojie], yeshi dui wo zhiqian de renmen de tixing [gaojie].” Dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi buming zhenli, yin'er beiqi ta.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, fanshi wo suo paiqian de shizhe, wo du qishi ta:“Chu wo wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, nimen zhi neng chongbai wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Pu ci zhi zhu [an la] you ernule.” Zanmei ta chaojue! Bu,[tamen suo wangyan de an la de ernu, ru er sa yu tianshi deng, tamen] zhishi yixie ying shou zunjing de puren.
Tamen bu gan zai ta [an la] qishi qian xian kaikou, tamen zhi feng ta de mingling xingshi.
Ta zhidao tamen zai jinshi [suo fasheng] de shiqing, ye zhidao tamen zai houshi [jiang fasheng] de shiqing, tamen zhi ti ta [an la] suo xiyue zhe qiuqing. Tamen yin kongju er jingwei ta.
